video_prompt: Futuristic city at twilight: Hovering vehicles slowly traverse illuminated roads. Digital billboards display changing faces with shifting colors. Distant flying vehicles move across the skyline. People's silhouettes animate the bustling pedestrian areas. City lights constantly twinkle and glow.
image_prompt: **Vibrant, high-angle wide shot of a futuristic metropolis at twilight. Sleek, glowing cars (some hovering) on a multi-lane road with blue illuminated tracks. Giant digital billboards featuring women's faces in purple/pink hues adorn curved glass skyscrapers. Elevated pathways connect towering, glowing buildings, with smaller flying vehicles in the midground. Neon accents and illuminated windows define a technologically advanced urban future.**
refined_video_prompt: Hovering vehicles slowly glide along roads. Digital billboards animate with morphing faces and pulsating colors. Distant flying vehicles steadily drift across the skyline. Silhouetted figures bustle and flow through pedestrian areas. City lights constantly flicker, twinkle, and undulate.
